pages.text: Lituites is a nautiloid from the Middle Ordovician period that possessed a straight shell with a coil at the end of it. Its shell was coiled in early growth stages but later becomes uncoiled.
$(l)Eats:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Breeds with:$() Fish Food$(br)$(l)Egg Type:$() Drops Egg$(br)$(l)Method of Obtaining:$() Kill for Eggs/Bucket
